Table of Contents

Class TextureUpload

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Textures
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Low level class for queueing texture uploads to the GPU. Should be manually disposed if not queued for upload via SetData(ITextureUpload).

public class TextureUpload : ITextureUpload, IDisposable

Constructors

TextureUpload(Image<Rgba32>)

Create an upload from a TextureUpload. This is the preferred method.

public TextureUpload(Image<Rgba32> image)

Parameters

image Image<Rgba32>

The texture to upload.

TextureUpload(Stream)

Create an upload from an arbitrary image stream. Note that this bypasses per-platform image loading optimisations. Use TextureLoaderStore as provided from GameHost where possible.

public TextureUpload(Stream stream)

Parameters

stream Stream

The image content.

Bounds

The target bounds for this upload. If not specified, will assume to be (0, 0, width, height).
